level.heading: Assault with intent to commit mayhem or with dangerous weapon.
level.text: Every person convicted of an assault with intent to commit mayhem, or of an assault with a dangerous weapon, shall be sentenced to imprisonment for not more than 10 years. In addition to any other penalty provided under this section, a person may be fined an amount not more than the amount set forth in § 22-3571.01.

level.heading: Cross References
level.text: Additional penalty for possession of firearm, see § 22-4502.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in § 5-132.21, § 7-2508.01, and § 24-112.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-317 added the last sentence.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Applicability of D.C. Law 19-317: Section 401 of D.C. Law 19-317 provided that the act shall apply only to offenses committed on or after June 11, 2013.
